original_text: That in those days, when the king Ahasuerus sat on the throne of his kingdom, which was in Shushan the palace,
korean_text: 당시에 아하수에로 왕이 수산 궁에서 즉위하고

sentences.original_text: when king Ahasuerus sat on the throne of his kingdom,
sentences.korean_translation: 아하수에로스 왕이 그 나라의 왕위에 앉아 있을 때에
